pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī bahussutā hoti bhāṇikā visāradā paṭṭā dhammiṃ kathaṃ kātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.4: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇaṃ undriyati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.8: Atha kho te manussā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā pariveṇatthāya chandakaṃ saṅgharitvā thullanandāya bhikkhuniyā parikkhāraṃ adaṃsu.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:6.9: Thullanandā bhikkhunī tena ca parikkhārena sayampi yācitvā bhesajjaṃ cetāpetvā paribhuñji.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.2: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:7.8: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:8.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpeyya, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:11.2: ekāya bhikkhuniyā, na saṃghassa, na gaṇassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.2: yaṃatthāya dinnaṃ taṃ ṭhapetvā aññaṃ cetāpeti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.4: Nissajjitabbaṃ saṃghassa vā gaṇassa vā ekabhikkhuniyā vā.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:13.7: “idaṃ me, ayye, aññadatthikena parikkhārena aññuddisikena puggalikena saññācikena aññaṃ cetāpitaṃ nissaggiyaṃ, imāhaṃ saṃghassa nissajjāmī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.1: Aññadatthike aññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.2: Aññadatthike vematikā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np10:14.3: Aññadatthike anaññadatthikasaññā aññaṃ cetāpeti, nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ.
